original_title: Police security for former President Ranil to remain unchanged
original_body_lines: The Police Spokesman DIG Nihal Thalduwa has confirmed that the security detail for former President Ranil Wickremesinghe, which includes 50 Special Task Force (STF) personnel, will remain unchanged.
However, he noted that the necessary number of personnel required for the former president’s security will be reviewed and allocated soon.
